p: As part of other experiments, the antimicrobial activity of oil from A. absinthium herb was tested against Enterococcus hirae, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus aureus, and against Candida albicans and Saccharomyces cerevisiae var. chevalieri. The sensitivity of the pathogens was assessed by liquid diffusion. The extract was antifungal towards both yeast species. The study did not prove antibacterial activity against the bacteria used [ 18].
